DimlyLitRoom.Body: You find yourself in a dimly lit room. In the center, there's a mysterious hourglass on a pedestal.

ExamineHourglass.Body: As you approach the hourglass, you notice it's filled with shimmering sand that seems to flow endlessly between its two bulbs. The sand appears to be magical.

LookAroundRoom.Body: You see an old lamp on a table and a dusty book on a shelf.

TakeLamp.Body: You take the lamp. It might be useful in dark places.

ReadBook.Body: The book tells a tale of an ancient amulet hidden in a mysterious realm. It might be important.

TakeHourglass.Body: You carefully pick up the hourglass. As you lift it off the pedestal, the room starts to spin, and you feel a strange sensation.

Desert.Body: You suddenly find yourself in the scorching desert, surrounded by vast dunes of sand. The hourglass is still in your hand.

Choices.Text: Climb the nearest dune to get a better view

DuneTop.Body: From one side of the Dune Top, you see a hidden cave with a bright ambience emitted. From the other side, you see some palm trees accompanied by the sound of flowing water. Where do you go?

LookForShelter.Body: You find a small rock formation that provides some shade. There is a narrow passage leading to a dark cave.

HiddenCave.Body: You cautiously enter the hidden cave. It's too dark to see anything without a light.

Choices.Text: Use the lamp to light the way

CaveWithLamp.Body: With the lamp illuminating the cave, you find a glowing crystal.

GlowingCrystal.Body: The glowing crystal emits a gentle light and seems to resonate with the hourglass in your hand. You sense a connection between them.

Choices.Text: Touch the crystal with the hourglass

TouchCrystal.Body: As you touch the crystal with the hourglass, a surge of energy courses through you. The hourglass begins to glow, and you feel a powerful force enveloping you.

Choices.Text: Embrace the power and let it take you somewhere else

SurrealRealm.Body: You find yourself in a surreal realm, filled with ethereal landscapes and enigmatic creatures.

Choices.Text: Examine the surroundings in this mysterious realm

MysteriousRealm.Body: As you explore the mysterious realm, you encounter strange beings and witness magical phenomena. It's a realm of wonders beyond comprehension. You are not able to understand the native language of the creatures. However, one of the creatures points towards the Hourglass in your pocket.

Choices.Text: Hold the Hourglass in your hands

HoldHourglass.Body: It's a miracle! You can now understand the foreign creatures. You find an amulet on the ground, which the creatures seem to revere.

TakeAmulet.Body: You pick up the amulet and feel its power. The creatures gesture towards three paths that lead out of the realm.

Choices.Text: Ask the creature how to get back home

AskCreature.Body: Upon engaging in conversation with the native, you find out that there is only one person that can get you home: The Time-Keeping Wizard. You learn that he lives in Tick-Tock Town to which there are three ways. Which one do you choose?

AncientRuins.Body: You navigate through the Ancient Ruins, facing various challenges and uncovering old secrets. You find a locked gate that requires an amulet to open.

Choices.Text: Use the amulet to unlock the gate

LookAroundRuins.Body: You find an ancient inscription that seems to describe the history of the ruins. It mentions a hidden chamber.

Choices.Text: Use the amulet to unlock the gate

HiddenChamber.Body: You discover a hidden chamber with treasures and another glowing crystal.

TakeTreasures.Body: You take some treasures. They might be useful later.

Choices.Text: Use the amulet to unlock the gate

EnchantedForest.Body: You wander through the Enchanted Forest, encountering magical creatures and avoiding traps. There is a magical tree that seems interactive.

MagicalTree.Body: The magical tree speaks to you in riddles and gives you a hint: 'Seek the amulet to find your way.'

ContinueForest.Body: You thank the tree and continue through the forest. You find a hidden path that leads to Tick-Tock Town.

MysticalRiver.Body: You travel along the Mystical River, solving riddles and navigating treacherous waters. You finally find a boatman who takes you to Tick-Tock Town.

TickTockTown.Body: You arrive in Tick-Tock Town, a place where time flows differently. You find the Time-Keeping Wizard's tower in the center of the town.

WizardTower.Body: You enter the tower and meet the Time-Keeping Wizard. He listens to your story and agrees to help you return home.

ThankWizard.Body: The Time-Keeping Wizard smiles and waves his hand. You feel a rush of wind and a bright light envelops you. When you open your eyes, you find yourself back home, safe and sound.

PalmTrees.Body: You walk towards the palm trees and find a beautiful oasis with fresh water and fruit-bearing trees. You take a moment to rest and replenish your strength.

OasisExploration.Body: As you explore the oasis, you find a hidden path that leads to a mysterious garden filled with rare flowers and plants. In the center, there is a portal.

End.Body: Congratulations! Youâ€™ve completed the adventure of the Hourglass Beta. Thank you for playing.

Amulet.Description: A magical amulet found in the Mysterious Realm.

Lamp.Description: An old lamp that can light up dark places.

Treasures.Description: Ancient treasures from the hidden chamber in the ruins.
